thread.title: Amazon shortlists 20 cities for second headquarters

title: Amazon shortlists 20 cities for second headquarters
text:
Amazon shortlists 20 cities for second headquarters Thursday, January 18, 2018 - 00:48 
Amazon has short-listed 20 cities and regions, including one in Canada, for the construction of a second headquarters that it says will generate 50,000 new, high-paying jobs. Aleksandra Michalska reports.
